TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit JpegBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class JpegBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Joint Photographics Experts Group (JPEG) format images.

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Joint Photographics Experts Group (JPEG) format images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] 格式的點陣圖支援畫面格層級的縮圖及框架層級的中繼資料。 format bitmaps support frame level thumbnails and frame level metadata. 它們不支援全域縮圖預覽、 全域中繼資料或多個框架。They do not support preview, global thumbnails, global metadata, or multiple frames. 編碼不在部分信任中運作。Encoding does not work in partial trust. 請參閱[WPF 部分信任安全性](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)的部分信任的詳細資訊。See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image should be flipped horizontally during encoding.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image should be flipped horizontally during encoding.

value.span: 如果在編碼; 水平翻轉影像否則， 。

span.span: if the image is flipped horizontally during encoding; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 水平翻轉表示之來源影像不失真轉換，而且會取代先前不失真格式轉換。The horizontal flip represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的值屬性。The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property. [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#2)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image should be flipped vertically during encoding.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image should be flipped vertically during encoding.

value.span: 如果在編碼; 垂直翻轉影像否則， 。

span.span: if the image is flipped vertically during encoding; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 垂直翻轉表示之來源影像不失真轉換，而且會取代先前不失真格式轉換。The vertical flip represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的值屬性。The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property. summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the quality level of the resulting [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the quality level of the resulting [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image.
The quality level of the JPEG image.

value.span: 值範圍是 1 （最低品質） 到 100 （最高品質） （含)。

span.span: The value range is 1 (lowest quality) to 100 (highest quality) inclusive.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的值屬性。The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Imaging::Rotation Rotation { System::Windows::Media::Imaging::Rotation get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Imaging::Rotation value); };
member this.Rotation : System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the degree to which a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image is rotated.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the degree to which a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image is rotated.
The degree to which the image is rotated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援只在 90 度遞增旋轉。Rotation is supported only in 90-degree increments. 旋轉表示之來源影像不失真轉換，而且會取代先前不失真格式轉換。The rotation represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的值屬性。The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property. [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#2)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]
